             <div aria-label="Featured pics" class="c-carousel c-navigation-featured-content">
              <div aria-hidden="true" class="c-carousel__slide--is-small c-carousel__slide--is-active c-carousel__slide--has-children u-ratio-container c-carousel__scroller-item" data-qa-slide="true">

                      <li class="c-navigation--primary__list-heading">

                      <path d="M200 2C89.4 2 0 90.6 0 200.2c0 109.3 89.4 198.2 200 198.2 110.5 0 200-88.8 200-198.2C400 90.6 310.5 2 200 2zm0 375.3c-98.7 0-178.8-79.3-178.8-177.1S101.3 23 200 23c98.7 0 178.8 79.4 178.8 177.2 0 97.8-80.1 177.1-178.8 177.1zm2.3-269.2c-27.9 0-48.4 18-52.4 46.8l24.4 2.5c1.6-16.6 11.9-28.1 27.5-28.1 14.7 0 25.2 11.8 25.2 26.5s-11.5 25.1-21.7 34.8c-15 14.5-16.8 20.5-16.8 35.2v14.9h22.8v-11c0-13.5 1.6-16.8 11.9-27.1l16.6-17.8c6.3-8.5 10-17.4 10-30.2.2-26.2-17.6-46.5-47.5-46.5zm13.1 167.3c0-9.1-6.6-16.4-15.8-16.4-9.2 0-15.6 7.3-15.6 16.4 0 9.1 6.5 16.7 15.6 16.7 9.2 0 15.8-7.6 15.8-16.7z" role="presentation">
                      </path>
                     </svg>
                    </button>
                    <div class="c-form-field-tooltip__content" id="tooltip-bfabda60-8afa-11eb-8e35-3bc05c84fd8f" role="tooltip" style="height:0;opacity:0;max-height:0">
